how-to: To list your venue go to OpenStreetMap editor and add payment:bitcoin=yes tag to it.
how-to-alt: Alternatively you can submit a note here and hope some OSM contributor add it for you.
please-on-ground: Please don't create new venues unless they have physical presence on ground!
every-hour: Data are updated every hour. Currently there are
official-thread-source: Official BitcoinTalk thread | Source code available from GitHub
